title: Ticket #3628: Test new EC2 HOWTO
description: After rewriting the HTCondor-Wiki[.cs.wisc.edu] page "How To Set Up Elastic Compute Cloud Pools", test the new configurations.
remarks:
2013-May-21 11:30:25 by tlmiller:
Tested using the following set-up (not ideal; the VM was annoying and complicated things):

Used a machine on the public network as the central manager (rarhost-01.batlab.org). Used a VM (running on rarhost-00.batlab.org) as the submitter; NAT'd. Ran an execute node in EC2. (Security group set to allow SSH and ports between 9600 and 9700.) Find full configurations attached.
attachments:
• condor-ec2-cm.tar.gz 34751 bytes added by tlmiller on 2013-May-21 16:33:40 UTC.
    Central manager config.
  • condor-ec2-exec.tar.gz 34538 bytes added by tlmiller on 2013-May-21 16:33:53 UTC.
    Execute (EC2) node config.
  • condor-ec2-schedd.tar.gz 34368 bytes added by tlmiller on 2013-May-21 16:34:09 UTC.
    Submit node config.
creator: tlmiller
